1.instruction:
Create a modern, multilingual cafe website for toMy Kawiarnia Warszawa optimized for GitHub Pages deployment. 

**Requirements:**
- Primary language: Polish (pl), with Ukrainian (uk), English (en), and Turkish (tr) translations
- Color palette: Black and white (matching the logo at https://www.facebook.com/photo/?fbid=122159075444021583&set=a.122113312946021583)
- Technology: Use Shadcn-ui, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and ensure GitHub Pages compatibility (static site, proper routing with hash-based navigation or proper base path configuration)
- Design: Unique, original, user-friendly, modern and responsive

**Content to include:**
- Cafe name: toMy Kawiarnia Warszawa
- Phone: +48 530 381 052
- Address: Al. Jerozolimskie 42, 00-024 Warszawa
- Hours: Mon-Sat 9am-8pm, Sun 12pm-8pm
- Social mission: Fundacja Leny Grochowskiej project, employs 60%+ people with disabilities, third location (after Siedlce and Gdańsk), opened September 2023
- Awards: Sweets & Coffee Awards® (Debiut konceptu), Food Business Awards® (Kawiarnia społecznie odpowiedzialna)
- Offerings: Specialty coffee, artisan pastries, sweets, ceramic workshop, cultural events, art workshops
- Source links for content/images: https://www.facebook.com/toMyKawiarniaWarszawa/mentions/, https://fundacjalenygrochowskiej.pl/kat-aktualnosci/otwieramy-tomy-kawiarnia-w-sercu-warszawy/, https://www.instagram.com/tomy_kawiarnia_warszawa/

**Website sections:**
1. Hero/Home with cafe name and compelling visual
2. About section (cafe story, social mission, Fundacja Leny Grochowskiej)
3. Menu/Offerings (coffee, pastries, ceramics, events)
4. Gallery with cafe photos
5. Contact section with address, phone, embedded map (Al. Jerozolimskie 42, 00-024 Warszawa), opening hours
6. Language switcher (PL/UK/EN/TR)

**GitHub Pages requirements:**
- Configure for static hosting (no server-side rendering)
- Use hash-based routing or proper base path configuration
- Ensure all assets load correctly with relative paths
- Include proper index.html as entry point
- Test that the site works when deployed to GitHub Pages without modifications

The plan has been confirmed with the user. No need to ask human or draft plan again. Proceed directly.

2.instruction:
CRITICAL: Replace ALL AI-generated placeholder images with REAL photos from toMy Kawiarnia Warszawa's social media and verify menu accuracy.

**Image Sources to Use:**
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tomy_kawiarnia_warszawa/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/toMyKawiarniaWarszawa/mentions/
- Foundation website: https://fundacjalenygrochowskiej.pl/kat-aktualnosci/otwieramy-tomy-kawiarnia-w-sercu-warszawy/

**Required Actions:**
1. Download REAL photos from the cafe's Instagram and Facebook pages showing:
   - Actual cafe interior/atmosphere
   - Real coffee being prepared/served
   - Actual pastries and desserts they serve
   - Real ceramic workshop photos
   - Real team members working
   - Actual logo from https://www.facebook.com/photo/?fbid=122159075444021583&set=a.122113312946021583

2. Replace ALL current images in /workspace/shadcn-ui/public/assets/ with real downloaded photos

3. Verify menu content accuracy - check what they ACTUALLY serve:
   - Coffee offerings (specialty coffee, specific types)
   - Pastries and desserts (cheesecakes, cakes, specific items)
   - Ceramic workshop details
   - Cultural events and art workshops
   Update translations in all language files (pl.json, uk.json, en.json, tr.json) to reflect ONLY what they actually offer

4. Test that all images load correctly in the website

**Important:**
- Use ONLY real photos from their social media - NO AI-generated images
- Do NOT add menu items they don't actually serve
- Ensure image file names match what's referenced in components (Hero.tsx, Gallery.tsx, Menu.tsx)
- Keep GitHub Pages compatibility

The plan has been confirmed with the user. No need to ask human or draft plan again. Proceed directly.
